00051 void ConfigurationEditor::setuplayout() {
00052         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00053         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addNewButton_);
00054         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeButton_);
00055 
00056         QFormLayout* selectorLayout = new QFormLayout();
00057         selectorLayout->addRow(tr("Current configuration:"), &configurationSelector_);
00058 
00059         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00060         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00061         topLayout->addLayout(selectorLayout);
00062         topLayout->addWidget(&activeViewEditor_);
00063 }

00065 void ConfigurationEditor::setupConnections() {
00066 
00067         connect(&addNewButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00068                 this, SLOT(onAdd()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069         connect(&removeButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00070                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071         connect(&configurationSelector_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00072                 this, SLOT(onConfigurationChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void ConfigurationEditor::onAdd() {
00076 
00077         askSave();
00078         
00079         // create dialog to input the settings for the new configuration
00080         CreateConfigurationDialog dialog(handler_, component_, this);
00081         // if user cancels the dialog
00082         if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected) {
00083                 return;
00084         }
00085 
00086         // get the info from the dialog
00087         QString viewName = dialog.getConfigurationName();
00088         VLNV configVLNV = dialog.getConfigurationVLNV();
00089         QString implementationRef = dialog.getImplementationViewName();
00090 
00091         // get the directory path to save the files into
00092         QString compPath = handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv());
00093         QFileInfo compInfo(compPath);
00094         QString dirPath = compInfo.absolutePath();
00095 
00096         // create the configuration
00097         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf(new DesignConfiguration(configVLNV));
00098 
00099         switch (dialog.designSelection()) {
00100                 // if user wanted to use the existing design
00101                 case CreateConfigurationDialog::USE_EXISTING: {
00102                         // set the configuration to reference the same design.
00103                         desConf->setDesignRef(designWidget_->getConfiguration()->getDesignRef());
00104                         break;
00105                                                                                                           }
00106                 // if user wanted to create a new design
00107                 case CreateConfigurationDialog::CREATE_EMPTY: {
00108                         VLNV designVLNV = dialog.getDesignVLNV();
00109                         desConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
00110 
00111                         QSharedPointer<Design> design = QSharedPointer<Design>(new Design(designVLNV));
00112                         handler_->writeModelToFile(dirPath, design);
00113                         break;
00114                                                                                                           }
00115                 // CreateConfigurationDialog::CREATE_COPY
00116                 default: {
00117                         VLNV designVLNV = dialog.getDesignVLNV();
00118                         desConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
00119 
00120                         QSharedPointer<Design> design = designWidget_->createDesign(designVLNV);
00121                         handler_->writeModelToFile(dirPath, design);
00122                         break;
00123                                  }
00124         }
00125 
00126         handler_->writeModelToFile(dirPath, desConf);
00127 
00128         // create new view for the component and set it to reference to the configuration
00129         View* view = component_->createView();
00130         view->setName(viewName);
00131         // if user specified an implementation reference
00132         if (!implementationRef.isEmpty()) {
00133                 view->setTopLevelView(implementationRef);
00134         }
00135         view->setHierarchyRef(configVLNV);
00136         view->addEnvIdentifier(QString(""));
00137 
00138         handler_->writeModelToFile(component_);
00139 
00140         // now that files have been saved tell design widget to open the new configuration.
00141         designWidget_->setDesign(component_->getVlnv(), viewName);
00142 
00143         // set the configuration to be editable
00144         designWidget_->setProtection(false);
00145 
00146         // update this editor
00147         setConfiguration(designWidget_, false);
00148 
00149         // now theres at least two configurations so one of them can be removed.
00150         removeButton_.setEnabled(true);
00151 }
00152 
00153 void ConfigurationEditor::onRemove() {
00154         // there has to be at least two views to remove one
00155         Q_ASSERT(configurationSelector_.count() > 1);
00156 
00157         // get the current view that is to be removed.
00158         QString viewToRemove = configurationSelector_.currentText();
00159 
00160         QMessageBox::StandardButton answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Remove the configuration"), 
00161                 tr("Are you sure you want to remove the configuration %1?").arg(viewToRemove),
00162                 QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Cancel, QMessageBox::Cancel);
00163 
00164         if (answer == QMessageBox::Cancel)
00165                 return;
00166         
00167         // disconnect the signals from selector
00168         configurationSelector_.disconnect(this);
00169 
00170         // remove the configuration from the selector
00171         int index = configurationSelector_.currentIndex();
00172         configurationSelector_.removeItem(index);
00173 
00174         // get the name of the new configuration to display
00175         QString newView = configurationSelector_.currentText();
00176 
00177         // find the vlnvs of the objects to remove
00178         VLNV configVLNV = component_->findView(viewToRemove)->getHierarchyRef();
00179         VLNV designVLNV;
00180         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(configVLNV);
00181         if (handler_->getDocumentType(configVLNV) == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00182                 QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00183                 designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
00184         }
00185         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(configVLNV) == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00186                 designVLNV = configVLNV;
00187                 configVLNV.clear();
00188         }
00189         libComp.clear();
00190 
00191         // remove the view from the component
00192         component_->removeView(viewToRemove);
00193 
00194         // ask component's remaining hierarchy refs
00195         QList<VLNV> hierRefs = component_->getHierRefs();
00196         
00197         // if config vlnv is still valid then it can be removed 
00198         bool removeConfig = configVLNV.isValid();
00199         bool removeDesign = true;
00200 
00201         foreach (VLNV ref, hierRefs) {
00202                 
00203                 // if theres still a reference to the configuration don't remove anything
00204                 if (ref == configVLNV) {
00205                         removeConfig = false;
00206                         removeDesign = false;
00207                         break;
00208                 }
00209 
00210                 // if theres reference to design then don't remove the design
00211                 else if (ref == designVLNV) {
00212                         removeDesign = false;
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 // if one of the remaining configurations references to the design
00216                 libComp = handler_->getModel(ref);
00217                 QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = libComp.dynamicCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00218                 if (desConf && desConf->getDesignRef() == designVLNV) {
00219                         removeDesign = false;
00220                 }
00221         }
00222 
00223         if (removeConfig)
00224                 handler_->removeObject(configVLNV);
00225         if (removeDesign)
00226                 handler_->removeObject(designVLNV);
00227 
00228         // save the component 
00229         handler_->writeModelToFile(component_);
00230 
00231         designWidget_->setDesign(component_->getVlnv(), newView);
00232         designWidget_->setProtection(false);
00233         setConfiguration(designWidget_, false);
00234 }
00235 
00236 void ConfigurationEditor::setConfiguration( DesignWidget* designWidget, bool locked ) {
00237 
00238         // if there was a previous design being displayed.
00239         if (designWidget_)
00240                 designWidget_->disconnect(this);
00241 
00242         // connect the new design.
00243         designWidget_ = designWidget;
00244         connect(designWidget_, SIGNAL(refreshed()),
00245                 this, SLOT(onRefresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00246         connect(&activeViewEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00247                 designWidget_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00248 
00249         addNewButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00250         removeButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00251         configurationSelector_.setEnabled(true);
00252 
00253         // get the component being edited
00254         component_ = designWidget->getHierComponent();
00255 
00256         // get the names of the hierarchical views.
00257         QStringList hierViewNames = component_->getHierViews();
00258         
00259         // if theres only one configuration then it can't be removed.
00260         if (hierViewNames.size() < 2)
00261                 removeButton_.setDisabled(true);
00262 
00263         // ask the active view name.
00264         QString activeView = designWidget->getOpenViewName();
00265 
00266         // find the index of the active view and set it as selected
00267         int activeIndex = hierViewNames.indexOf(activeView);
00268 
00269         // disconnect signals so the index can be changed
00270         configurationSelector_.disconnect(this);
00271         configurationSelector_.clear();
00272         configurationSelector_.addItems(hierViewNames);
00273         configurationSelector_.setCurrentIndex(activeIndex);
00274 
00275         // reconnect the signal
00276         connect(&configurationSelector_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00277                 this, SLOT(onConfigurationChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00278 
00279         activeViewEditor_.setDesign(designWidget, locked);
00280 
00281         // display this widget
00282         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->show();
00283 }
00284 
00285 void ConfigurationEditor::clear() {
00286 
00287         if (designWidget_) {
00288                 designWidget_->disconnect(this);
00289                 designWidget_ = 0;
00290         }
00291 
00292         configurationSelector_.clear();
00293         configurationSelector_.setDisabled(true);
00294         
00295         addNewButton_.setDisabled(true);
00296         removeButton_.setDisabled(true);
00297         
00298         activeViewEditor_.clear();
00299 
00300         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->hide();
00301 }
00302 
00303 void ConfigurationEditor::onRefresh() {
00304         setConfiguration(designWidget_, designWidget_->isProtected());
00305 }
00306 
00307 void ConfigurationEditor::onConfigurationChanged( const QString& newConfigName ) {
00308 
00309         askSave();
00310 
00311         if (designWidget_) {
00312 
00313                 // ask if previous configuration was locked
00314                 bool wasLocked = designWidget_->isProtected();
00315 
00316                 designWidget_->setDesign(component_->getVlnv(), newConfigName);
00317 
00318                 // keep the locked/unlocked state from the previous configuration to this configuration.
00319                 designWidget_->setProtection(wasLocked);
00320                 setConfiguration(designWidget_, wasLocked);
00321         }
00322 }
00323 
00324 void ConfigurationEditor::askSave() {
00325         // if the current configuration is modified
00326         if (designWidget_ && designWidget_->isModified()) {
00327 
00328                 // ask user if he wants to save the changes
00329                 QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00330                         "Do you want to save changes to " + designWidget_->getDocumentName() + 
00331                         "?",
00332                         QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, this);
00333 
00334                 int ret = msgBox.exec();
00335                 // if user wanted to save
00336                 if (ret == QMessageBox::Yes)
00337                         designWidget_->save();
00338         }
00339 
00340 }
00341 
00342 void ConfigurationEditor::setLocked( bool locked ) {
00343         addNewButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00344 
00345         // if theres only one configuration it can't be removed
00346         if (configurationSelector_.count() < 2)
00347                 removeButton_.setDisabled(true);
00348         else
00349                 removeButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00350 
00351         activeViewEditor_.setLocked(locked);
00352 }
